column1: The Pit Room////It's set up cafeteria style with the sides all spread about.  You may find more tender ribs outside the loop
column2: but these were tasty.  Good smoke
column4: and fall off the bone delicious.  The brisket had strong flavor too.  The BBQ sauce can be a little intense with the vinegar/black pepper (heart burn warning) but I poured it on anyways.
